attributes.action: If there is another scottish referendum then ALL scots should be allowed to vote
attributes.additional_details: There are a lot of scots like me who are very proud of their nationality and who want or dont want to stay part of the UK. Ms Sturgeon must be made to give us a say in our countries future. Not just 16 year olds and people who have only moved there in the last 6 months.
attributes.background: It is unfair that the future of my nation of birth is being decided and i have no input into it. All people born in scotland should have a say. It is unfair and loaded that immigrants and 16 year olds should be the only ones with the right to vote. It should be along the same rules as Brexit.
